plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be drama, as many of the movies listed fall into that category. The user's favourite kind of plot is likely to be character-driven, as many of the movies focus on the development of the protagonist and their relationships with others. The user's favourite kind of musical score is likely to be orchestral, as many of the movies listed feature this type of score. The user's favourite mood for the musical score is likely to be uplifting, as many of the movies have an uplifting tone. The user's favourite setting is likely to be modern, as many of the movies are set in the present day or in the recent past. The user's favourite visual style is likely to be realistic, as many of the movies have a realistic look. The user's favourite writing style is likely to be dialogue-driven, as many of the movies feature intricate dialogue between characters. The user's favourite runtime is likely to be around two hours, as many of the movies listed are that length. The user's favourite themes are likely to be coming-of-age, redemption, and self-discovery.
